## Software

1. [ViroProfiler](https://github.com/deng-lab/viroprofiler): a containerized bioinformatics pipeline for viral metagenomic data analysis

2. [TPD](https://github.com/rujinlong/TPD): a computational pipeline for therapeutic phage discovery from prophages

## Database

1. [TCMSP](https://old.tcmsp-e.com/tcmsp.php): a database of systems pharmacology for drug discovery from herbal medicines

2. [DeepsmirUD_web](https://github.com/rujinlong/DeepsmirUD_web): a database of predicted small molecule-mediated regulatory effects on miRNA expression
